channel.title: How Do I Make A Place/Area Wild?
channel.description:
Hey everyone my name is Ben I own PobScape and I've been coding and updating all day, but I can't seem to fix my PK, Right now it's located at Lumbridge and i'm trying to make it at Varrock instead if you have any help please tell me
Email: pobdol@hotmail.com

item.title: How Do I Make A Place/Area Wild?
item.dc:creator: @pobdol pobdol
item.description:
@pobdol wrote:

Could you please just help me out this is what I got for Lumbridge PK

public boolean nonWild() { if ((absX >= 3244 && absX <= 3264 && absY >= 3207 && absY <= 3253) || (absX >= 3227 && absX <= 3239 && absY >= 3216 && absY <= 3193) || heightLevel == 1) { return false; } else { return true;
If you can give me that but with the varrock PK that would be alot of help

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Make A Place/Area Wild?
